refresh_token.description: This is the [offline token](https://access.redhat.com/articles/3626371#bgenerating-a-new-offline-tokenb-3) used to generate access tokens for Red Hat Subscription Manager. This must be provided in the config or in the environment variable `RHSM_REFRESH_TOKEN`.

created_by.description: The user account used to create the subscription allocation.

created_date.description: The date and time the subscription allocation was created.

entitlements_attached_quantity.description: The number of entitlements associated with the subscription

last_modified.description: The date and time the subscription allocation was last modified.

name.description: The name of the subscription allocation.

type.description: The type of the subscription allocation.  The only one supported by this resource is `Satellite`.

uuid.description: The UUID of the subscription allocation that was created.

version.description: The version of the subscription allocation type.  This defaults in the API to 6.5 and cannot be set through the API. It can be adjusted in the RHSM portal.

block.description: Resource to manage a RHSM Subscription allocation for a Red Hat Satellite server.

allocation_uuid.description: The UUID of the subscription allocation to create the entitlement on.

contract_number.description: The support contract associated with the entitlement.

pool.description: The ID of the pool you would like to create the entitlement from.

quantity.description: The number of entitlements you would like add to the allocation/use from the pool.

block.description: Resource to manage entitlements to a RHSM Subscription Allocation for a Red Hat Satellite server.

allocation_uuid.description: The UUID of the subscription allocation to create the manifest from.

last_modified.description: The date and time the subscription allocation was last modified.

manifest.description: The manifest as downloaded from the RHSM portal.  This is a zip file which has been base64 encoded to a string.

manifest_last_modified.description: The date and time the subscription allocation was last modified when the manifest was last generated.

block.description: Resource to create a manifest from a RHSM subscription allocation that can be uploaded to a Red Hat Satellite server.

account_id.description: The ID of a cloud account that you would like to request Red Hat Cloud Access for.

date_added.description: The date the cloud account was added to Red Hat Cloud Access.

gold_image_status.description: The status of any requests for gold image access for the cloud account.

gold_images.description: A list of gold images to request access to for the account. Images available to a cloud provider can be found with the `rhsm_cloud_access` data source. Once you request access to a gold image, it is not possible to disable access via the API.

nickname.description: A nickname to help describe the account. Defaults to ``.

provider_short_name.description: The short name of the cloud provider that the `account_id` is in. This must be one of "AWS", "GCE", or "MSAZ".  Other cloud providers are supported but have not been tested so they are not in the list of valid options.

source_id.description: Source ID of linked account. Only for accounts created via Sources on cloud.redhat.com.

verified.description: Is the cloud provider account verified for RHSM Auto Registration?

block.description: Resource to manage entitlement for Red Hat Cloud Access for an account in a supported cloud provider.

created_by.description: The user account used to create the subscription allocation.

created_date.description: The date and time the subscription allocation was created.

entitlements_attached.description: A list of entitlements attached to the subscription allocation.

entitlements_attached_quantity.description: The number of entitlements associated with the subscription

last_modified.description: The date and time the subscription allocation was last modified.

name.description: The name of the subscription allocation.

type.description: The type of the subscription allocation.  The only one supported by this resource is `Satellite`.

uuid.description: The UUID of the subscription allocation to look up.

version.description: The version of the subscription allocation type.

block.description: Data source to look up a RHSM Subscription allocation.

allocation_uuid.description: The UUID of the subscription allocation containing the entitlement.

entitlement_id.description: The ID of the entitlement to look up in the specified allocation.

entitlement_quantity.description: The quantity of the subscription available in the entitlement.

block.description: Data source to get information about an entitlement associated with a Red Hat Subscription Manager allocation.

allocation_uuid.description: The UUID of the subscription allocation.

future.description: Should pools only valid in the future be listed?

pools.description: A list of pools available to the subscription allocation.

block.description: Data source to get information about pools available to a Red Hat Subscription Manager allocation.

enabled_accounts.description: A list where each entry is a single cloud provider

block.description: Data source to look up information about cloud providers entitled to Red Hat Cloud Access.
